actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare (Subsequently: Human Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare (Subsequently: Human Resources).

official_title: A bill to promote economy, efficiency, and improved service in the financing, administration, and delivery of social welfare service provided under Federal law.

summary.text: Declares that the promotion of economy, efficiency, and improved service in the financing, administration, and delivery of social welfare services is the policy of the Congress. Establishes a Commission to be known as the National Commission on the Reform of Income Maintenance Programs for the purpose of developing legislative proposals designed to carry out the policies set forth in the first section.

titles.title: A bill to promote economy, efficiency, and improved service in the financing, administration, and delivery of social welfare service provided under Federal law.
